name: framework
description: The aurelia framework brings together all the required core aurelia libraries into a ready-to-go application-building platform.

classes.name: Aurelia
classes.description: The framework core that provides the main Aurelia object.

params.name: loader
params.description: The loader for this Aurelia instance to use. If a loader is not specified, Aurelia will use a defaultLoader.

params.name: container
params.description: The dependency injection container for this Aurelia instance to use. If a container is not specified, Aurelia will create an empty container.

params.name: resources
params.description: The resource registry for this Aurelia instance to use. If a resource registry is not specified, Aurelia will create an empty registry.

methods.description: Adds an existing object to the framework's dependency injection container.
methods.name: withInstance

params.name: type
params.description: The object type of the dependency that the framework will inject.

params.name: instance
params.description: The existing instance of the dependency that the framework will inject.

methods.description: Adds a singleton to the framework's dependency injection container.
methods.name: withSingleton

params.name: type
params.description: The object type of the dependency that the framework will inject.

params.name: implementation
params.description: The constructor function of the dependency that the framework will inject.

methods.description: Adds a transient to the framework's dependency injection container.
methods.name: withTransient

params.name: type
params.description: The object type of the dependency that the framework will inject.

params.name: implementation
params.description: The constructor function of the dependency that the framework will inject.

methods.description: Adds globally available view resources to be imported into the Aurelia framework.
methods.name: globalizeResources

params.name: resources
params.description: The relative module id to the resource. (Relative to the plugin's installer.)

methods.description: Renames a global resource that was imported.
methods.name: renameGlobalResource

methods.description: Loads plugins, then resources, and then starts the Aurelia instance.
methods.name: start

methods.description: Instantiates the root view-model and view and add them to the DOM.
methods.name: withSingleton

params.name: root
params.description: The root view-model to load upon bootstrap.

params.name: applicationHost
params.description: The DOM object that Aurelia will attach to.

methods.description: Configures a plugin before Aurelia starts.
methods.name: plugin

params.name: moduleId
params.description: The ID of the module to configure.

params.name: config
params.description: The configuration for the specified module.
